comment: Updated iOS workflow: pinned runner to macos-13/xcode15.3, added artifact retention/error handling, added placeholder for snapshot baseline push, and set fetch-depth for git operations.
Updated Android workflow: added artifact retention/error handling, added placeholder for snapshot baseline push, and set fetch-depth for git operations.
Added E2E smoke test workflow (smoke.yml) with iOS Detox and Android Maestro jobs, including artifact handling and runner pinning.
Created README.md with smoke workflow CI badge and local smoke test execution instructions.
Created build-pipeline.md documenting CI workflows, secrets, artifacts, and status checks.
Created project_plan.md outlining RC-polish delta tasks and objectives.
Made ios-build.yml callable and defined outputs for smoke test dependency. Updated checkout and cache actions to v4 for consistency.
Made android-build.yml callable and defined outputs for smoke test dependency. Updated artifact naming for consistency.
